data.description: Fairly new Built in 2019 well maintained, 3 story home which features an open living room and kitchen upon entry. 3 bedrooms and 2 full bath upstairs . A partially finished BASEMENT, Yes BASEMENT that could be completed as additional bedrooms, theatre room, studio, office and /or fitness room by the new buyer.
